abstract.t: This document defines an efficient, robust, and scalable scheme formessage compression when the transmission path between the compressorand decompressor is unreliable, i.e. prone to errors, losses, andmisordering. The scheme is applicable in particular to compressionof SIP, RTSP, SDP, and HTTP messages. A major case of application isthe compression of SIP protocol messages over bandwidth limitedlinks, such as cellular links.
